alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Copiah; Hinds (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 2:47PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Claiborne, southwestern Hinds and northwestern Copiah Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 247 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Utica, or 18 miles southeast of Vicksburg, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Utica around 250 PM CDT. Newman around 255 PM CDT. Dry Grove around 310 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Learned. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees.
